intro: I am Full-Stack developer with a background in Java Spring Boot, MySQL, and React. While being exposed practically to the design and deployment of strong web applications, I could familiarize myself with the development of efficient and scalable solutions. My experience covers backend development, database management, and frontend design, thus enabling me to develop fully fledged software products. I am passionate about making breakthrough, user-oriented applications, realizing that my journey to acquire knowledge and upgrade my skills is endless in the ever-evolving field of software development.
